short_summary: Temporary Help Services, Department of National Defense.
full_summary:
**Temporary Help Services Request for Proposal (RFP) for One (1) Computer, Application Support**

**Notice ID**
- **referenceNumber-numeroReference**: cb-6605-39459827
- **solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation**: S4522014


**Key Dates**

- **publicationDate-datePublication**: June 22, 2023
- **tenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture**: June 28, 2023 at 1:00 p.m. Eastern Time

**Notice Details**

- **procurementMethod-methodeApprovisionnement-eng**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **procurementCategory-categorieApprovisionnement**: SRV (Service)
- **unspsc**: *80111600 (Temporary Personnel Services)
- **noticeType-avisType-eng**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Eligibility**

This tender is open only to those Suppliers engaged under Supply Arrangement EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: 13.9 Computer and Application Support.

**Required Services**

Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services. Qualified Suppliers are invited to submit a proposal. The resources required will have a minimum security clearance of Secret.

**Proposal Requirements**

Proposals must be submitted electronically to the notice URL (ProxiWeb) no later than 1:00 p.m. Eastern Time on June 28, 2023.


**Important Documents**

- *English: (<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6605/s4522014---method-1---rfp-%28english-version_0.pdf>)
- French: (<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6605/s4522014---method-1---rfp-%28french-version-%28002_0.pdf>)


**Point of Contact**

- Name: CFSG(O-G)
- Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: (613) 971-7955
